# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using connect_entities
- Make sure to pass the correct number of arguments to the connect_entities function.
- Ensure that the positions passed to the connect_entities function are integers.

### Errors when accessing entity positions
- Make sure to access the position attribute of an entity correctly.
- Ensure that the entity has a position attribute before trying to access it.

### Errors when working with fluid systems
- Make sure to connect the offshore pumps to a fluid system correctly.
- Ensure that the fluid system is working correctly and that there are no blockages.

# NAMESPACE
### Utility Functions
- connect_entities: This function is used to connect entities to each other. It has been invoked multiple times, but has failed due to incorrect usage.
- get_entity_position: This function is used to get the position of an entity. It has been invoked multiple times, but has failed due to incorrect usage.

### Important Variables
- offshore_pump: This variable is of type OffshorePump and represents an offshore pump entity.
- boiler: This variable is of type Boiler and represents a boiler entity.
- prototype: This variable is of type Prototype and represents a prototype of an entity.
- position: This variable is of type Position and represents the position of an entity.
- fluid_system: This variable is of type FluidSystem and represents a fluid system.
